website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking single-bowl sink that looks great with both classic and contemporary kitchen decor.
pros: An extremely high-quality granite-based sink that is easy to install and is as durable as can be
Available in various sizes and finishes
cons: Requires a very stout cabinet (one made for stainless-steel sinks might not cut it)

customer_reviews.title: THINK TWICE BEFORE YOU BUY
customer_reviews.text: This sink is terrible. We installed it in our vacation home which has limited use. And we purchased the base grate that protects it. We wash the sink routinely. Regardless the base is darkened and does not return to it's original color. The protective grate may help but the points where it touches the sink are also darkened and will not clean. Unfortunately we chose to under-mount the sink....our mistake.....Hopefully this info will save others the pain and dissatisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Sink
customer_reviews.text: We had the same sink, but it was stained from the previous owner. I am not sure what they did. This was the simplest direct replacement for us. Packaging was good and clean. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let this review sink in
customer_reviews.text: We'd grown tired of our two compartment sink and decided to add this to our kitchen as part of its refurbishment. We purchased the white and are tickled with it. Not only is it well designed and easy to clean, but it's simply beautiful. Washing sheet pans and larger pots has gone from a struggle to easy. I'd buy it again in a split second.
customer_reviews.author: James P McComas

customer_reviews.title: Sink arrived in poor condition
customer_reviews.text: 1. The Sink arrived in poor condition. With Cracks and Holes in it Please see the pictures attached. 2. Also, it came with mounting clips (However, I'm not sure if they're necessary for undermounting) 3. There isn't a strainer, therefore you've have to purchase one separately
customer_reviews.author: Boycey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SINK
customer_reviews.text: I was super nervous to buy this sink off of Amazon, but it came well packaged and arrived safely. It was significantly cheaper than buying from a store where I live. We've had it for 3 years and love it. It is HUGE, easy to clean, and scratch proof. The only issue is that the first week I had it I dropped a dish in the sink and it broke because it is very hard. I immediately bought a rack for the bottom and was instantly even more perfect. Pardon the dirty dishes in the sink!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SUPER SINK!!!
customer_reviews.text: In renovating my kitchen I decided to rip out the old dual stainless sink which I dreaded. This Blanco quartz sink is beyond awesome!!! The tub is so spacious.... and the "look" is clean and minimalist. Many have said in reviews theirs came with cracks but I have to say - delivery was quick and the box was super solid and very well protected and packed - no damage upon arrival. This sink is worth every penny. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Coolbreez

customer_reviews.title: Decently priced sink
customer_reviews.text: Owing to its single drain design, some food particles can become stuck on the left side of the sink and is difficult to wash away. Perhaps a more aggressive angle would have been useful. Seems to be relatively resistant to scratching as long as you aren't dropping knife tips into it. Otherwise solid build and solid packaging as there was no breakage (and believe me it would have been sent right back if there was a single scratch on it). There are probably higher end sinks out there if you have the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this sink and then returned it because it was cracked in two locations. Second one was delivered today and was ALSO broken. Disgusted. Would NOT buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Like the Sink; Terrible Instructions
customer_reviews.text: The included instructions are on the level of 1) Install the sink 2) Now you are done. A simple line drawing, or a reply to my inquiring email, of how the over-the-top clips install would have saved me quite a bit of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jag U. Ar

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this sink!!
customer_reviews.text: This sink was purchased to replace an older acrylic one. Everything involved in the ordering process was simple and the product arrived in the timeframe as promised. I couldn’t be happier with this sink. It is very well made. The style is simple modern that would look good with any kitchen decor. I chose a white sink with only one hole for the faucet. I had also bought a new faucet with a simple, sleek design. They look great together. No issues with keeping the sink clean. I would recommend this sink for new construction or renovation.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: crowning touch to our kitchen remodel.  beautiful.  buy it!
customer_reviews.text: together with Blanco 441232 3-in-1 Disposal Flange, Stainless Steel and the stainless steel wire sink grate (Blanco 221-010 Stainless Steel Sink Grid ..) and the cool commercial-style pull-down sprayer faucet, (Enzo Rodi ERF7209251AP-10 Modern Commercial Spring Single-Handle Pull-Down Sprayer Kitchen Faucet Stainless Steel) this sink looks beautiful every day!!!!! This is the crowning touch to our kitchen remodel. beautiful. buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Pottress

customer_reviews.title: and creates a beautiful contrast along with my black dishwasher and black and ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous sink--and the customized stainless steel rack is worth every penny. I ordered the Blanco sink stopper and air gap too. This essentially black sink sits on top of my white tile counter, and creates a beautiful contrast along with my black dishwasher and black and stainless steel double oven gas range. Refrigerator is white, my preference, and it doesn't look at all out of place since it ties in seamlessly with the white tile on countertops. Wish you could hear the glowing comments my friends have made about my black and white kitchen. I'm a pianist, and one of my friends said it reminds them of the keyboard on my piano. Everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alternative to stainless sink
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My wife loves it. Guest love it. Easy to use, easy to clean. Large enough for two people to use at the same time. The off-center drain allows more usable space below the sink. Comes with a faucet punch-out options on both sides of the center pre-drilled faucet hole. Our counter-top fabricator just installed it (with wood cleats not clips) and drilled the holes through both the counter-top and the sink edge based on where I wanted the holes. Would buy again. First version came cracked so had to reorder and used a different vendor.
customer_reviews.author: KaaTheSnake

customer_reviews.title: Another winner
customer_reviews.text: Usually we do black on our renos but, this time around got the sand color. Wow. Beautiful sink. The bronze faucet looks fantastic on it. This is our fifth single bowl granite sink. Can never go back to double bowls. The single bowl is the easiest thing to do everything in. As far as delivery it came on time and the UPS guy, who said he used to work at a big box DIY store, and knows how these sinks can sometime have a crack in them, said he'd never seen a sink packed so well. I opened the box to make sure it was okay. Packed superbly.
customer_reviews.author: REF

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink. You can stop reading now and just buy it. This is my second big single bowl sink, and I will NEVER go back to a dual bowl sink again. The black looks amazing and stays pretty clean. I've had it for over a year now. I just quick wipe it down after washing up the dishes, and it looks fine. Haven't needed to use any vinegar or any such thing to clean it yet. Also, go and buy the Blanco bottom grid for the sink. It looks great, works great (especially if you leave stuff in the sink for days on end - I know. Who does that, right?), and was a great addition to my sink.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: less expensive sink/hole config, but still works!
customer_reviews.text: very well packaged, good shipment time, product was 100% brand new. FYI: a lot of times when undermounting this sink, the drilled pilot hole for the faucet is not the only location that a faucet can work. in my case, we installed it undermount in Granite. you cannot drill a faucet hole within .5" of the egde of the granite, and therefore, the hole would have been off of the sink lip anyway. i bought this sink and ended up with a centered on the rear faucet location.
customer_reviews.author: PRIMUS LC

customer_reviews.title: Nice deep bar sink.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice high quality deep bar sink. When we installed the sink we had to modify the mounting a bit because we wanted a center mounted faucet. We used a hole saw to start the opening and then used a jig saw to create a U shape. Out faucet is mounted to the counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great sink by the way
customer_reviews.text: awsome sink... when I first opened box, there was a large area that seemed as though the finish was defective. I almost returned it, but then decided to try a few things first. After a series of fails using minor cleaners and ever slightly abrasive cleaners/sponges, I used a really really really small amount of wd-40 on a paper towel, rubbed it on, and that magically fixed it. I got lucky to have tried this, as nothing else was working. Great sink by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: ... over a year ago and probably one of the best things we installed
customer_reviews.text: We purchased and installed this in our new kitchen over a year ago and probably one of the best things we installed!!! A year later and it still looks new, the gray is nice and soft and compliments our quartz countertop. I have recommended this product to another friend and they too love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what we wanted. First one was received damaged and Amazon replaced it. The option for setting the faucet at different points was a real benefit. Not sure yet about scratch/stain resistance, only installed two days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this Sink!!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful product! The materials used and the construction are as good ~ if not better ~ than any other sinks that I've seen. This is going into the small kitchenette in a guest cottage and the color is beautiful with the cabinets and countertop. I was particularly attracted to the shape as well ~ and I really like having the kitchen faucet on that right corner. The sink arrived in perfect condition ~ having been amazingly well-packaged so there would be no damage to this rather heavy sink. Great design, great construction, great price ~ can't beat that!!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sink but know what you are getting
customer_reviews.text: So far its been great. The sink looks amazing and I love the size of the bowl. There are a few things to be aware of first the sink is large and can cause problems with hinges being too deep. Also the size of the sink means it has a pretty shallow slope to the drain, it drains ok but leaves a little water sitting at the bottom if you want to keep hard water from leaving spots you might want to clean it more often.
customer_reviews.author: travis s thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink
customer_reviews.text: I used this sink in my RV build and I love it. Super high quality. Doesn't scratch. Its really deep so you can actually wash a pan in it. I also have used this brand of sink in my house for over 5 years and it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Handsome bar sink!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this bar sink, and it works beautifully with our Fantasy Brown granite. Love the curve at the back and the offset faucet location, which is not only an interesting design, but a functional one as well, allowing for greater ease in using the sink. The size of this sink is a huge improvement over the one we previously had, and a significant upgrade in style over a stainless steel one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this sink!
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice upgrade...easy to keep clean and holds a lot of dishes, so if we just parties dishes can be stacked up in the sink until things wind down and we're ready to load up the dishwasher. Great color too! We were hesitant to get this over Stainless Steel or the classic White Farmhouse sink, but so happy we did.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Williams

customer_reviews.title: beautiful sink if you dont mind that the drain comes ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful sink if you dont mind that the drain comes with just the ring - no drain AND. it's a plastic fitting!!! I think it will work ok, but we arent hooking up a disposal system to this particular drain sink.... (for our bar in the basement, I dont need a garbage disposal down there) so the drain only piece is an extra $40.. so for a $300 sink, I would think you would offer both plastic pieces for the sink and let the homeowner decide which one they'll use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bosley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this Blanco Sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is wonderful! It's very attractive and very practical. Large enough to wash large pots and pans. Looks perfect in my kitchen alongside grey cabinets and grey/black/white granite. Can't say enough good about it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sink...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this sink. I panicked as well when I began seeing white "residue" covering the sink, but through trial and error I discovered the secret to cleaning it. I keep a spray bottle filled with mineral oil/ baby oil under the sink, and every day I spray it down and wipe it with paper towels. It looks brand new every time. If I'm cooking a lot, I'll wipe it down a few times throughout the day. Works like a charm for me.
customer_reviews.author: SemySweet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality sink
customer_reviews.text: We were getting new countertops and the installer was going to charge us nearly double the price for this same sink. We have loved this sink, it's been a huge upgrade over our 50:50 stainless steel sink.
customer_reviews.author: BCARG

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesistate! Beautiful and durable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink! First one we ordered came with a small crack so we ordered another with no issue. Our countertop installer recommends these sinks to their clients. Matches our Rococco quartz countertops perfectly! Love the large deep single tub style with side drain. I can wash, soak, and prep all at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: B. Tessmer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink, but it does chip
customer_reviews.text: I have this sink and a full sized kitchen sink. I've had the larger sink for less than two years now and it does chip. These are two small chips in the side wall. I'm not sure how they got there as I'm fairly careful and the sink is large enough to accommodate any pan that I use. I may just store a 2nd sink in case they discontinue the product (since it would be painful if I couldn't find a sink to fit my granite countertop). It does clean up nicely ... the color hides a lot of dirt (especially when you have the sink rack) ... so it is fairly easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Till

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Researched this sink for quite a few months... IT'S AMAZING! Even though I measured the size many times, it still astounds me as to how big it is. Was somewhat worried about other reviews that spoke of white spots and when I did notice 2 small ones appearing, I purchased a gentle cleanser and they are gone. The sink dries quickly, the off center drain makes everything easier and created a lot more room under the cabinet. We have the sink paired with Uba Tuba granite and it is such a beautiful look! This sink has exceeded all my expectations. Wish I could give this 6 stars...
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I got rid of stainless steel sink and put this one in and love it! It is so easy to keep clean where the stainless steel was not. I don't know why so many people want stainless steel in their kitchens. When you have hard water every drop leaves a stain unless you always want to be wiping it out, which I do not want to do. The Blanco sink is superb in my opinion being mostly granite and it wasn't very heavy so one guy was able to install it easily. And it looks so nice with my countertops! Can't say enough good things about it.
customer_reviews.author: Tj Reilley

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just what I wanted to replace the horrid shallow stainless sink my builder tried to pass off as a laundry sink! Now they know! This would also be suitable for a kitchen sink. Deep enough for large pots as well as small dogs and stunningly beautiful. My only regret is that since my granite was already installed with the ss sink as an over mount, that's how I needed to install this one, but it doesn't look near as bad as I feared it might. Highly recommended from a very picky sink person!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma'sGirl

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: My local plumbing supply, Hughes Supply, wanted $400. two months to receive. They suck. This is a perfect sink. Took ONY two days for delivery at a price $75 less
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Zaleski

customer_reviews.title: BEST SINK EVER!'n
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS SINK! I've had it for two years and just love it! It is extremely durable, easy to clean, and is SO SPACIOUS!!! If you get it, I do recommend that you get the stainless steel drain as the black ones are just covered with vinyl which is easily accidemtally torn by knives or other utensils, which exposes a stainless steel drain anyway. But the sink is GREAT!! Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Love my Blanco sink!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how this sink looked in the picture and it is even more beautiful in person. The Cafe Brown color is perfect in my kitchen with my brown/tan/clear backsplash and my biscuit colored countertop. The size is unbelievable! I feel like I'm in a professional kitchen! The quality is excellent and having pre-scored holes for the faucet makes it easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Arrived shattered
customer_reviews.text: Sadly it arrived shattered. It’s too bad. I loved the color. But had to ship back. That part was smooth but was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alysha

customer_reviews.title: THE Sink to Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is our third house, and we purchased our third Blanco, Cafe Brown, sink. It's indestructible, doesn't scratch, stain, or fade. Every once-in-awhile, we spray and wipe WD-40 onto the surface to make it look BRAND NEW. We've been using this sink for years, and it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Kinga Kongo

customer_reviews.title: Best looking bar sink
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink. It's a match to our larger kitchen sink. The style is beautiful and it's so smooth. It's easy to keep clean and the depth is great.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan's Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Big beautiful sink
customer_reviews.text: 1st one arrived cracked. Easily returned & replaced. Love the color, depth, height of this sink. A pan fits with plenty of room. I am in love. Beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Betty Larkins

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old stainless double sink and I love how roomy it is. It arrived well packaged and in good shape. I have used it for two months now and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mairi's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Blanco sink =fantastic product (I own two black). 2/3 and 1/3 bowl design not my fav.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Blanco sink. I purchased a 2/3- 1/3 bowl for my condo and it's the only sink I've ever owned that actually received compliments. It's black. It's easy to clean. and it's withstood my clumsiness. The one bowl that I just bought for my lake house is same positives but food sticks on the left side- has to be manually scapped down to the drain and that makes me less thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Aronow

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my laundry room, but I would put it in my kitchen -- it is beautiful, durable and a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A

customer_reviews.title: This is the second sink that was sent and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second sink that was sent and it came with all four corners broken and cracked! I’m returning it and looking somewhere else to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Flores

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Never thought a sink would aesthetically have much bearing in a kitchen. A sink is a sink, right? Well, this sink added the right touch. Great look, great quality, and strong. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this sink with a matching drain
customer_reviews.text: I really like this color. It is black - but sort of sparkles (kind of like the background of most black granite). I cook alot and was really frustrated with the divided stainless sinks that I couldn't even adequately clean my larger fry and roasting pans - but I can clean my full cookies sheets in this sink - laying flat... With the matching drain (you need to order that part separately anyway) - it is very classy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable, attractive and functional sink.
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest sink I have ever had. My friends have it too and have found it to be very durable, functional and attractive.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: We have had this sink a couple of months now. It is the nicest sink I have ever owned!!! Not a stain or scratch and it is not pampered. I also love the one big space. Everything fits into it. If you have a few glasses or rinsed dishes in it, there is still room to get at the drain and prepare your meal. It is mounted on top of counter, so it is not too deep. The lines are so clean it is easy to keep looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Mary quinlan

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Love the look... My son will be installing.. cant wait. The outside box had issues .. a hole had been repaired. but it didn't seem to effect the sink which was nestled in foam in a second inside box. It also took twice as long to be delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Newby

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The color is perfect. Easy to care for and plenty of room for all of my awkward pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Botts

customer_reviews.title: Is my drain suppose to be silver?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sink August 2019 and I really like it. Today as I was cleaning it the black started to peel out of the drain. I’m not sure that is suppose to happen? The picture of my order depicts a silver drain but I’ve never paid attention until today when I had to research because of the peeling. If the drain should be silver my hope is someone will share how to get the coating out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SINK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new sink! So far it's standing up to everything this product was suppose to be. I waited 6 months before I gave my review to make sure it was holding up. And it is. I just LOVE this sink. And the grate you put in the sink. It's a must have. I didn't like how much it cost, but after reading the reviews, I broke down and bought it. And I'm glad I did. Great value for the price too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Blanco sinks!
customer_reviews.text: These sinks are awesome! We've purchased several over the years, dark and light, small and large, for both indoor and outdoor kitchens. They are extremely durable, especially for outside use and are beautiful, no matter what color you choose. I hate stainless sinks, and these are the perfect alternative. Very affordable, especially when you consider you'll never need another one. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Twin Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very happy after 2 years of use.
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about ordering this because we didn't have any experience with these. After 2 years it still looks great. Very glad we went with this instead of stainless.
customer_reviews.author: BullGator

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Sink
customer_reviews.text: After seeing this sink at the supply store we loved it but didn't love the price. Started looking online and saved about $100 with buying through Amazon. The sink is large and deep, matches the granite countertop looks great. Easy to clean. A great choice. We purchased this sink two years ago for a kitchen remodel, but have since moved. The first thing we ordered for our new home remodel was another of these sinks. We can't say enough good about it, and it cost less the second time than it did the first!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love This Sink
customer_reviews.text: First sink I received had hairline fractures in 2 of the 4 corners. Unfortunately, we didn't find this out until the granite installers were already here doing the job. Had to pay them another $125 to come back to finish the job, but we were able to exchange it with Amazon no problem. Absolutely love the sink. Got it under-mounted, so that adds a couple more inches to the already-very-deep sink.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Using as an outdoor sink to bathe my Cairn Terriers and to water my plants. Beautiful and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Slidellgirl

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and beautiful maintenence free sink
customer_reviews.text: Used in our laundry room with granite countertop. Metallic grey goes well with stainless appliances. Depth is great as under mount for washing tall items and not having water splash out. You won't believe how much more room you have with the arch till you mount the sink. No issues with scratching or staining. Word of caution: make sure your cabinet is large enough as the faucet needs to go in the right corner and cannot go at the top as with a standard cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Ron P.

customer_reviews.title: Showed up broken!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed as it showed up broken and looked like a used return.
customer_reviews.author: Spring Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Buy one!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sink and probably indestructible. We had a dual porcelain sink before and it was always getting scratch marks on it. This sink does none of that. It gives us plenty of room to do almost anything, looks great. It is very impressive.And the price is right!!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Its big and there is nothing better than a huge sink
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink. Very hard to find brown. So happy I found this one. Will never go back to having to sinks ever again.😘
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Pedler

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sink
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink, looks amazing in my new kitchen. It's deep with lots of room for pots and pans. I wanted a sink that was not going to scratch, chip or have issues with water spots and this was the perfect choice. We love it. Everyone who comes to see our new kitchen, stop at the sink with amazing comments
customer_reviews.author: Nettie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous sink!
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and was very pleased. Everyone who sees it comments on how nice it looks. I got the matching faucet-- which is equally as impressive looking. They are going to look great when I get them installed. They both look and feel heavy duty. A good combination of modern / industrial look. They look great with the GE Slate appliance line I am putting in.
customer_reviews.author: Jackrocks

customer_reviews.title: and I absolutely love it! It replaced a builder's grade stainless steel ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this sink 6 months ago, and I absolutely love it! It replaced a builder's grade stainless steel drop in, and it fit perfectly into the same cutout hole in the counter. We did have some shipping issues with Amazon sending the wrong sink, but their customer service quickly fixed the problem. It looks great and is easy to clean. The punch- out hole was a little tricky, but overall, I'm extremely happy with how it has held up.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Very durable! No scratches or water marks after 5 months of use!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink! I have the black graphite one & no scratches or watermarks after 5 months of use!
customer_reviews.author: EBerry

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing sink ever.
customer_reviews.text: 2nd sink i have owned made of this material. We moved and I knew what sink I wanted. Love everything about it. I get compliments all the time and they comment they are jealous. Lol. Wasn't sure how I'd like going to a one bowl sink. I don't handwash many dishes so I LOVE it!!! Easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: lpatton

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this sink!
customer_reviews.text: The first sink we had gotten in had a minor crack in the corner. Didn't notice until we took it outside in the sunlight (we were taking it to our granite people so they could make sure they were cutting the correct size). We contacted amazon and it was a very quick easy process, we sent it back and got a new one right away and it was perfect! We LOVE this sink and get SO many compliments on it. It is the favorite part in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Manotti's

customer_reviews.title: I love this sink.
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink. I needed a small sink for my kitchen that was still going to be big enough to use. This sink fits my IKEA cabinet perfectly and is nice and deep. I love the texture of it and the faucet opening in the corner. It came quickly and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sink, sadly cracked.
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING sink. Great depth and size for a smaller kitchen. Love the color. Unfortunately is arrived severely cracked. I have requested a replacement and will update my rating after it arrives. Not a deal breaker but sad. Seemed well packed, but the outer box was badly damaged, however the inner factory box was pristine. Not sure how a crack this bad happened. Edit: UPDATE! The new sink arrived today. No outer box this time but no damage to box or sink this time. Still love the dimensions. Love it overall. This one seems a little more gray brown than chocolate though. Hopefully once oiled it will darken a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Rockangel

customer_reviews.title: I love this sink!
customer_reviews.text: We just updated our kitchen. This sink is beautiful. Love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had another version that I love in my own home
customer_reviews.text: What a buy! I had another version that I love in my own home. Since this was for a rental, the price was right. It is an excellent sink and would definitely recommend and purchase again if needed. Once you go to a single deep bowl, you won't ever want to go back.
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love my sink
customer_reviews.text: I found this sink in a high end plumbing store so I had already knew what to expect. However, I didn't expect to save so much money by ordering it online and it arrived perfectly. I love my big sink!! It fits all of my pans perfectly and if I want just a small amount of water to wash dishes it, I just fill a big pot and wash them in that to conserve. With a family of 5, we create a lot of dirty dishes, and they all fit inside it while my counter stays clean!
customer_reviews.author: Family of Five

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: Silgranite two (the second generation material) tops the first. They are all type II now. These sinks come packed well and perform beautifully. I have them in the laundry, kitchen and outside at a bar. They are SO easy to keep clean and the colors are very pleasant. They are affordable, quiet, relatively light in weight, look great and install easily. After three years of kitchen use, it still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Review4You

customer_reviews.title: Sink arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Although there was no packaging damage, the beautiful sink had cracks down each corner and an edge of the top flange was broken. Hoping to order again and receive in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Yerkes

customer_reviews.title: Great color, great size, slow delivery
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! This new color is great - not too brown and not too grey. The size of the sink is great and can hold everything we have. I even put a small dish drainer inside if I have some hand wash items and everything fits perfectly. My only issue was how long it took to be shipped. May not be an issue now but with mine I had to reschedule my counter installation twice because the 2-3 week delivery time they told me was actually more like 4.
customer_reviews.author: mhsCA

customer_reviews.title: Great Sink
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this sink for a bar. The sink has a really nice look to it and feels very solid. It matched well with our black galaxy granite counter tops. I really like how deep it is. One thing to keep in mind is that when selecting and installing a faucet try to get one that doesn't spray down directly at the drain cover. Our faucet does this and causes a lot of splashes. This however is not anything negative about the sink rather a warning when selecting a faucet to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: I. Nijjar

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this sink.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this sink installed for the last 4 months and I absolutely LOVE it. My husband and I even said again yesterday how happy we are with this sink and faucet set up. I'm not one to hand wash dishes often so I was really happy to find this sink with one big bowl. I use Soft Scrub to clean it weekly and it is still in like new condition. I will buy again if I move I love it that much.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very well packaged. Gorgeous sink
customer_reviews.text: I received my sink today. It's gorgeous! Feels durable! What I'm mostly impressed with is the packaging! Very secure. Tight and impact protected all over the bottom, top and sides! I ordered a copper drain which looks beautiful in it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lazalier

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, long-lasting quality
customer_reviews.text: sturdy and easy to clean. looks great with the counter and blends into the look rather than attract the eye to the sink. Update: sink installed in 2013 and now in 2020, it still looks new and I get regular compliments. No scratches are visible, no stains, and the offset drain opening allows for more under cabinet consolidated space and water drains when large pots are in the center. Still loving this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: evaluation

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sink.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing sink. It's beautiful and easy to care for. Been in about a month, now. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: jdf

customer_reviews.title: Great sink, but inspect before scheduling installation
customer_reviews.text: Great sink! Doesn't scratch, enough room for large items and always drys looking brand new. One caveat: Make sure that you inspect the sink before scheduling your installation. I had two of these delivered and both were cracked in the upper left corner of the sink. Three was a charm and I'm happy I didn't go another direction
customer_reviews.author: Kerri K

customer_reviews.title: Great sink but it
customer_reviews.text: I bought a kohler acranite sink and returned it it was junk . This Blanco is the best sink I have owned is is Amazing I would recommend getting the rack for the bottom that they sell. This sink is tough and cleans really well. I would buy blanco again and again
customer_reviews.author: jason w.

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Sink
customer_reviews.text: The Blanco 511-637 Diamond 15-Inch-by-15-Inch Bar Sink, Anthracite Finish is a great looking sink. I wanted a stainless sink but my wife won out on this black one to replace our dated bar sink. It looks spectacular with a nickel faucet. We have hard water and so far the sink does not collect water stains. Installation was easy and I highly recommend this sink which has an outstanding price/value.
customer_reviews.author: Jo B

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sink because of the style of it and because it's not porcelain, or stainless. I love it. It's very large, doesn't show water marks, doesn't stain, and cleans very easily. Delivery was right on time, packaged very well, in perfect condition. Could not be happier with my purchase, 5 star all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: ssanders

customer_reviews.title: Love my sink!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink. Very great quality, and love the dark grey color. I also purchased the match grate, and the combo it perfect. I have no hesitance in using this combo in any situation. I'm very happy with both my purchases.
customer_reviews.author: vickie anders

customer_reviews.title: It is a wonderful product, I'm recommending it to my sisters
customer_reviews.text: So far, this sink has not changed in color or stained or any other issues. Material is a bit soft so be careful if you're working with heavy tools around it. It is a wonderful product, I'm recommending it to my sisters!
customer_reviews.author: Mima

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It's gorgeous! We wiped it dry after our first 10-15 uses over concerns of water staining. Since then (two months ago) we've simply left it as-is after turning off the water and have Zero spotting issues. Already received several compliments. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Sink and Great Packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! The finish is smooth, color is consistent, and the edges are finished great. Giving extra props for the packaging...box in a box that had a ton of padding. The sink was about 2' x 2', but the vice it came in was about 5' x 4'! They made sure there was going to be no damage in shipping! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Tibbits

customer_reviews.title: great composite sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is exactly what I was looking for. I have had porcelain and stainless. I knew I didn't want either of these again. It cleans very easily and so far it seems indestructible. Hot pan have been placed in it and no sign of any marks at all.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this sink
customer_reviews.text: The bowl is huge and it looks fantastic with my brushed nickel faucet. I have had no issues keeping it clean. When I am done doing dishes, I just use my dish brush with dish liquid and brush it down, and rinse it off. No special cleaners needed. With my old sink, a pan or something would be in there and block the sink from draining. That is impossible with this sink because of the drain being off to the side and the way the sink gently slopes to it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen and Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great deep sink
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sink for 33 inch base. The sink goes practically all the way to the wall. I'd even recommend it for the standard 36 inch base since it's deep enough for the largest pan to wash or to clean veggies. Very solid surface mount sink, without the hollow sound of aluminum. I loved it so much in my house I used it wherever I can in the houses I flip for a unique, higher end look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Sink I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my new Blanco sink. I replaced my 7 year old stainless sink which I wasn't happy with because of the water spots, it always looked dirty. I've only had it installed for a couple of weeks but am enjoying it's size and easy of cleaning. I've been baking Christmas cookies and love that my large cookie sheets lie flat for soaking/cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic sink. We get many compliments on it and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic sink. We get many compliments on it and most importantly it is extremely functional. No more fighting big pots and pans when cleaning. We have only had it for about 2 months now, so hopefully will be as happy with the quality for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this sink for our kitchen remodel and loved it so much that we decided on this sink ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second remodel of a kitchen in 2 years. Purchased this sink for our kitchen remodel and loved it so much that we decided on this sink again for the new house kitchen remodel. Nice and deep, works perfectly for large pans and the black is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Alta Vista

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Like the looks matched new appliances and is very deep
customer_reviews.author: Leonard B.

customer_reviews.title: This is stunning sink for an exceptional price. It ...
customer_reviews.text: This is stunning sink for an exceptional price. It is a contemporary fit with my modern kitchen. Be warned, do not purchase the stopper and strainer and under mount clips. The stopper doesn't fit and the clips aren't necessary. I poured over $60 down the drain, literally.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bonnar

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Very easy installation. I've had the sink in our kitchen for about 2 years and the finish is no different than when we originally purchased it. Product shipped quickly and came exactly as described by vendor. Would not hesitate to recommend to anyone this method of buying the product. Ed Mattfeld, Spokane, WA
customer_reviews.author: Edward L. Mattfeld

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality and finish
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality and finish. I upgraded the basement wet bar counters and also replaced the sink with this one. looks great, and I really like the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sink! The dark color always looks beautiful and clean. No separator in the middle is amazing for washing large dishes, or items like a crock pot. We remodeled our kitchen and this new sink went perfect! Highly recommend :-)
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Girl

product_meta.title: BLANCO, Anthracite 441094 DIAMOND SILGRANIT Super Single Drop-In or Undermount Kitchen Sink, 33.5" X 18.5"
product_meta.description:
Color:Anthracite| Size:32.5" X 22"Both an expression of your individual style, and a testament to BLANCO's unsurpassed quality and craftsmanship - a variety of shape, sizes and features combine to bring you the DIAMOND collection. Every detail has been considered, from the large bowl capacity to the easy-to-clean, durable SILGRANIT surface. The BLANCO DIAMOND DUAL DECK SUPER SINGLE BOWL offers plenty of room for rinsing, washing, soaking, spraying and straining operations. Made from the rock hard, SILGRANIT patented surface, the DIAMOND kitchen sink features a smooth surface that is resistant to chips, scratches and heats up to 536°F. Even a fork or the bottom of a hot pan can't damage BLANCO SILGRANIT sinks. The colorful, non-porous surface also makes the bowl resistant from all stains, household acids and alkali solutions as well as easy-to-clean. For three generations, BLANCO has quietly and passionately elevated the standards for luxury sinks, faucets, and decorative accessories. A family-owned company, BLANCO was founded over 85 years ago in Germany, and recently celebrated a milestone of 25 years in the United States where we are recognized as a leader in quality, innovation, and unsurpassed service. Create the ideal kitchen experience with the versatility of the DIAMOND collection.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Blanco 440194 Diamond 33-1/2-Inch-by-22-Inch Single Bowl Kitchen Sink (Anthracite) is made from Silgranit which withstands extreme hot and cold fluctuations and is a uniquely resilient material, less likely to break dinnerware and fine crystal. Softly rounded drain grooves serve as a point of elegance as well as function. Item does not come with the mount clips.
feature_bullets: SINK DIMENSIONS: 33.5" L X 22" W X 9. 5" D and designed to fit a minimum 36" cabinet base
EASY INSTALLATION: Can be installed as either a drop-in or undermount for added convenience
ULTRA-DURABLE PATENTED MATERIAL: Heat, scratch, stain, chip and impact-resistant while also 100% hygienic and food-friendly
OPTIONAL ACCESSORIES: Grid (item #221010) and cutting board for drop-in only (item #440230)
TRUSTED QUALITY: Your BLANCO kitchen sink features a Limited Lifetime for added protection and complete peace of mind

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars705 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
